name: ONE MINUTE STORE
description:
It’s your job to watch your poor employee doing everything for you, order wares to be put up for sale and keep finances in check while also expanding.

The store only opens for one minute at a time before its closing time.

During the downtime you will be able to re-stock wares and purchase various upgrades, etc.

Known Bugs

-First time you open the finance window it shows the wrong values.. Close it and open it again
